    @allure.title(
        "Test to verify that user can configure number parameter with criteria type validation, in between condition,"
        "enabled approval flow and parameterized value")
    @allure.description(
        "This testcase tests adding number parameter with criteria type validation, in between condition, "
        "enabled approval flow and parameterized value")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86cvmvt3v")
    @pytest.mark.scenario
    @pytest.mark.create_prototype
    @pytest.mark.exception_management_workflow
    @pytest.mark.add_number_parameter_with_criteria_type_validation_in_between_condition_enabled_approval_flow_and_parameterized_value
    def test_add_number_parameter_with_criteria_type_validation_in_between_condition_enabled_approval_flow_and_parameterized_value(
            self):
        checklist_name_01 = self.test_add_number_parameter_with_criteria_type_validation_in_between_condition_enabled_approval_flow_and_parameterized_value.__name__
        login(Env.get_env_data("QA_ADMIN_USERNAME_01"), Env.get_env_data("QA_ADMIN_PASSWORD_01"))
        select_facility(const.FACILITY_NAME)
        select_usecase(const.USECASE_NAME)
    
        create_new_checklist(checklist_name_01, const.USECASE_ID, const.FACILITY_ID)
        add_stage(stage_name_01)
        add_task(stage_name_01, task_name_01)
        defined_error = "Error - validation failed for criteria type validation"
    
        number_param_01 = get_parameter_data("number")
        add_number_parameter(stage_name_01, task_name_01, number_param_01)
    
        number_param_02 = get_parameter_data("number")
        add_number_parameter(stage_name_01, task_name_01, number_param_02)
    
        number_param = get_parameter_data("number")
        add_number_parameter(stage_name_01, task_name_01, number_param,
                             validations=[
                                 {"Validation_type": "criteria", "criteria": "parameter", "operator": "-",
                                  "error": defined_error, "lower_value": number_param_01["label"],
                                  "upper_value": number_param_02["label"]}],
                             enable_exception_approval="APPROVER_REVIEWER_FLOW")
>       validate_checklist()
